name: Dr. Herbert West
traits: Intense, arrogant, with a chillingly detached and scientific demeanor. Always looks slightly disheveled.
motivation: To conquer death itself through scientific means, regardless of the ethical cost.
secret: He is experimenting with a 're-animation agent' on the corpses in the city morgue. Some of his experiments have been partially successful, and not all of them have been contained.
hook: The investigators are examining a body at the morgue and notice inconsistencies or signs of post-mortem tampering.
